body.p:
486
March 16th 5
Sergt. S. C. Noble
Co F 30th Ky Inf
Greensburg Ky
Sir:
Yours of Jany 22nd to Gov Bramlette, has been referred to this Office for answer.
We have no authority to detail any one in the United States service to recruit -- application should be made through your regimental Commander to have you detailed for that purpose.

Very Respectfully
D W Lindsey
Adjt Gen Ky
